【考法 1】 vt. 用力擦洗： to clean, polish, or wash by scrubbing vigorously

【考法 2】 vt. 搜查： to look through (as a place) carefully or thoroughly in an effort to find or discover something
【例】 the police scoured the city for the criminal 警方全城搜索罪犯
【近】 comb, dig through, dredge, hunt through, rake, ransack, rifle, rummage, sort through, troll

【记】 音：涮锅；音：水刮，用水冲刮洗(汽车)；obscure 暗的，不清楚的，看成是ob 不 + scour 洗
，擦亮组成
